Bevel

Bevel Electric Foil Shaver

Sale price$69.95 Regular price(/)

*20% OFF APPLIED AT CHECKOUT

A smooth shave, built for your skin. The Bevel Foil Shaver delivers closeness, comfort, and control—whether it’s a daily routine or a quick touch-up.

USUALLY SHIPS IN 1 BUSINESS DAY

30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

Why you’ll love it:

  • Closeness meets comfort: 3 flexible blades adapt to every contour for a smooth, irritation-free finish.

  • Sensitive-skin friendly: Dermatologist-tested swivel head reduces tugging and discomfort.

  • Smart performance: Auto-sensing tech adjusts to hair density for an even shave, every time.

  • Wet or dry ready: Shave in the shower or at the sink—pairs perfectly with Bevel  Clear Shave Gel.

  • Easy upkeep: Ideal for clean-shaven looks between trims; for longer growth, start with the Bevel Trimmer.

Complete Your Routine!

AUTOSENSING TECHNOLOGY

Reads and adapts to your hair density, capturing and cutting more hairs in every shave.

3 flexible blades adapt to your facial contours for maximum closeness and skin comfort.

CONSISTENT, CORDLESS POWER

Rechargeable battery for up to 50 minutes of cordless power. 5-minute quick charge for one full shave.

DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED

Dermatologist-tested swivel head adapts to facial contours to increase comfortability for sensitive skin.

WATERPROOF

Designed for wet and dry use. Use with Bevel Shave Cream or Clear Shave Gel for added glide and comfort.
